summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Crescent Drive from 24th Avenue North to a point 100 feet west of the west line of Pien Couch et al in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 16843, creating Local Improvement District No. 1578 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
